item.title: Viral Video Shows Skier Viciously Attacked By Snow Leopard After Trying To Take A Selfie With It - Bored Panda
item.description: Viral Video Shows Skier Viciously Attacked By Snow Leopard After Trying To Take A Selfie With It Bored PandaSnow Leopard Attacks Ski Tourist, Leaving Her Face Left Covered in Blood: Reports People.comSkier mauled by snow leopard after getting too close for a picture nypost.comWild Video Shows Skier Being Attacked by Snow Leopard in China The InertiaSnow leopard attacks skier in Xinjiang’s Koktokay; victim in stable condition, local officials say&nbsp…

item.title: Skier suffers brutal mauling after stepping within 10 feet of snow leopard for photo, video shows
item.description: Female skier survives snow leopard mauling in China's Fuyun County after authorities warned tourists about predator sightings near hotel, according to reports.
